website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a fun and unique but also practical end table, this one is both sturdy and stylish.
pros: Consumers like the attractive art deco-retro styling on this end table, and praise its sturdy design
Most found it easy to assemble
We love the fact that its muted tones can work with almost any decor, and though the legs are streamlined in style, they are also strong
cons: Some felt the cost was too high for the particle-board construction of the table top

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: These end tables are just what I needed... inexpensive and retro for my spare bedrooms. They were among the least expensive acceptable end tables on Amazon, and the fact that they had the retro legs was a plus since it matches some other furniture that I have. The table tops feel nice and solid, even though they aren't real solid wood. Assembly was easy: four screws, screwed in with the included Allen wrench, for each leg. They also included two extra screws, just in case. I'm very happy with these tables for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Juniorverse

customer_reviews.title: Good price for simple style. Nice material.
customer_reviews.text: This is very solid, and material just looking exactly I wanted. It's ashy brown color table, I covered it with marble sticker which also compliment my grey bed. Btw the sticker can strip off the tints from table.
customer_reviews.author: Gummy Power

customer_reviews.title: MISSING HARDWARE
customer_reviews.text: The product would have been easy to assemble if the hardware came with it! I ordered one of these tables before and was satisfied however, this one came without the hardware. I left it boxed since I was moving houses, and by the time I had opened it the return window had closed. I was very disappointed that the seller couldn’t help me get new hardware!
customer_reviews.author: Naomi Levy

customer_reviews.title: Really nice especially for how inexpensive it was
customer_reviews.text: It is a very study and quality piece of furniture. I bought it originally just for the legs and was going to use a different top that I made, but it's a little larger than I expected ( I should have read the measurements better) and I'm just going to have to leave it as is! Fits well and shareable between my two chairs. Really nice especially for how inexpensive it was!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Goode

customer_reviews.title: Bought it for the legs.
customer_reviews.text: I am giving this 4 stars because it is not solid wood. I am very opposed to using particle board or Mdf in the home but I bought it knowing I wanted to remove the hairpin legs and discard the top. I gel stained a preformed piece of pine from the home improvement store, gave it a few coats of poly and will attach the legs to the table with the hardware they included. We were able to remove the parts from the underside of the table and can use them. Hairpin legs are quite expensive so this was the perfect way to get them cheaper!
customer_reviews.author: AuntieB

customer_reviews.title: Awesome table, awesome price
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanting side tables for my guest room/office and came across these beauties in a BuzzFeed article. I ordered them and got them very quickly. They were packaged very well and were super easy to put together. The legs are a nice heavy metal, but the top is just what I'm assuming particle board with laminate. It still looks very nice and I'm not too picky on what material is used for the price. Definitely worth purchasing! (I took the picture with this room still in progress, so ignore the background!)
customer_reviews.author: imustbenicky

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly happy with this purchase! I have 2 kids and 2 dogs so I've abandoned all of my "good furniture" pieces for "good enough for now" furniture. I love mid-century modern and these (I bought 2 end and I coffee table) go perfectly with what I currently have. The legs are stylish. I'm sure my kids will eventually destroy the top and then I'll use the legs to make something new.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Hallam

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, perfect for kid's room
customer_reviews.text: So easy to assemble, my five-year-old did it! It even came with an Allen wrench and extra screws. We affixed the legs in about five minutes, and it was good to go. It's just the right height for a kid's bed, and it easily accommodates a lamp, water cup and a handful of books.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey M. Bacon

customer_reviews.title: Good looking sturdy table
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use as a printer table in my office. It looks even sturdier and better than I had hoped. I put it together in just a few minutes. The hairpin legs feel very nice, with just a bit of texture. I wouldn't use it to put drinks on, moisture would not be good for the surface, if you're using as an end table you'll want to use coasters. I am now planning to order the coordinating desk to use as a work table.
customer_reviews.author: Amber in SATX

customer_reviews.title: Great Minimalist, but Sturdy End Table
customer_reviews.text: This table is extremely simple to construct. You just screw in 8 screws with the allen wrench and you're set. The table looks great with its neutral colors, as pictured. My only concern is with the durability of the surface. It seems like the coating may be easy to chip or come off with a wet glass or sticky object, so I'd definitely recommend using coasters. I also added some tiny felt pads to the iron-type legs to make sure they don't scratch my hardwood floors. I haven't had any issues yet, and the table looks great in the guest bedroom!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Modern and Lovely!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these and couldn't be happier with the result. They are so pretty, the gunmetal gray is a beautiful neutral color and the legs are awesome and modern. The table was so easy to put together, we did it after 10 hours of moving and still managed to get the legs on and tight. Absolutely love them.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Peters

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy little table
customer_reviews.text: Nice size for small studio or an end table. Works well in my kitchenless studio near my bed and was worth the money. Not too big and not too small
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Easy to build!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy. Easy to build. Color just as shown. It's perfect. Pretty sturdy, well made and was very easy to build.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Fernanda

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much the same as other reviews. The legs are great! Very easy to assemble. I agree that the top, although it is sturdy, doesn't look very nice. But for my purposes it was perfect. I wanted a strong table to put a large plant on so I could put it near the sliding door in my kitchen. I was trying to give it as much winter sunlight as I could. I got just what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: S. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Its basically a sticker that will come of and then the table just looks horrible. I called the company
customer_reviews.text: The table is very stylish for the price, but the quality is NOT. Its basically a sticker that will come of and then the table just looks horrible. I called the company, and after 1 year there is nothing they can do...see the attached picture! Buy it if you need it less then a year lol.
customer_reviews.author: Sofia Galinski

customer_reviews.title: These look so awesome in our living room
customer_reviews.text: These look so awesome in our living room! We bought 2 and We also bought the TV stand to match. Love the retro "Jetsons" kinda look but the blue/grey wood tones really modernize the look. Easy to assemble and they arrived right on time.
customer_reviews.author: Tadichoke

customer_reviews.title: You get what you paid for.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what you need. Never had any problems with it until I moved it out of my bedroom and was shipping a package on top of it. Tape stick to it and ripped off the finish. Careful!
customer_reviews.author: Matt Crimmins

customer_reviews.title: Not so gray...
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of the hairpin legs! I'm a little disappointed about the coloring; I ordered "gray" and it definitely looks brown. And the top looks very cheap. However, it was SO easy to put together, it's light, and inexpensive- so I recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Good nightstand table for a spare room.
customer_reviews.text: Nice size table that can be used as a nightstand or end table. I wish the top was stained instead of a veneer, but that was stated in the description. Super easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Ren Fam

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and cute!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy, functional, and cute! I purchased several pieces from the same collection and I love them. Use coasters with drinks though!
customer_reviews.author: Gatts’

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Love how easy this table was to put together. It’s beautiful and sturdy, what more do you need?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: super sturdy, wood grain texture looks legit until you're ...
customer_reviews.text: super sturdy, wood grain texture looks legit until you're about a foot away. i bought 2 & use them as bedside tables. very minimal, perfect height. i'm looking to get a longer table for a tv i like the style so much!
customer_reviews.author: Celeste

customer_reviews.title: Nice legs!
customer_reviews.text: It's particle board with a *very* faux-looking wood grain. So, the top stinks. However, the hairpin legs really aren't bad especially considering that similar legs go for $60 to $80 online. I intended on replacing the top, so I'm fairly happy with my purchase. If I were planning to use as-is, however, this would be a bummer.
customer_reviews.author: B. S.

customer_reviews.title: This table was very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This table was very easy to assemble. It looks very nice, but the color is a little darker and a little bit more greenish-gray than the color it looks like in the photos.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of TwoLO

customer_reviews.title: This end table is perfect - color is organic yet weathered to give it ...
customer_reviews.text: This end table is perfect - color is organic yet weathered to give it a modern-rustic vibe. Also, the surface is very large! Enough for pretty much anything you can think of fitting on a nightstand, and more. Love it. Another note on the quality - although it is particle board with a laminate wood finish, the table is very solid and the finish is believable. I bought one for both sides of the bed, and I want to get more for other places in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Parker Davis

customer_reviews.title: Short Life Span
customer_reviews.text: I initially loved this and thought it was a great deal for the price. The legs are great but at the end of the day, within 15 months of ownership, it started to decline. The corners are peeling away and the surface has ripped in multiple places, like a piece of paper. It’s essentially a disposable piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: SGG

customer_reviews.title: Not quite what I expected but decent
customer_reviews.text: The top part looks much cheaper in person than in the photo. It has held up though without using coasters (which surprised me). It's a sturdy little table and doesn't rock. It is more of a square shape than it looks in the picture too.
customer_reviews.author: Beth S.

customer_reviews.title: Diverse and Efficient!
customer_reviews.text: Fits in multiple rooms and for many purposes. I combined it with a desk as a printer stand for a bit then after moving it now holds my record player. It’s size and color makes it a diverse fit, love it!
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Saunders

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Love this table, have three of them on the house .. clean lines and mixes great in mid century modern decor .
customer_reviews.author: Rocket

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice piece, especially for the price. Other places selling this sort of furniture want almost double the price. The wood on the top is pretty cheap, and will welt at the first contact of water. So if you get this, i would suggest coasters. It is a nice piece. I only give it four stars instead of five because the top is a little cheap looking. If it had a nicer top it would easily be five stars. It is sturdy and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The material is very sensitive to moisture, the condensation has already caused it to start to blister.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: YES but no
customer_reviews.text: I really like this end table! My only complaint is that the color is NOT the cool grey it appears, but rather more of a sandalwood color. Blech!
customer_reviews.author: Neener Nonner

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts to assemble-3 week wait!?!
customer_reviews.text: The table is missing the directions and the bags of parts. So, we are unable to put it together! I called the number provided and was told it would take 3 weeks to get them. That is unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Wernau

customer_reviews.title: Great sonoma oak side table
customer_reviews.text: The table came very well packaged and was easy to assemble in under 10 minutes. It is very well made, good finish and is sturdy. It matches very well with the Altra owen retro coffee table that we already have and would recommend this side table to anyone who wants to buy it. It looks far more expensive than its price. totally worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Vinod

customer_reviews.title: Nice table, feels solid and is easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Nice table, feels solid and is easy to assemble, but unfortunately mine arrived with scuffs / minor chips in a couple of places. Quality control appears to be lacking.
customer_reviews.author: NK

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if I'm a fan of this leaning leg style now that I see it in person, however, the assembly was exactly as indicated in the directions and everything fit perfectly. It's a nice, cheap sidetable.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney B

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and really nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and really nice for the price. Less gunmetal and more of a grayish brown but still in line with what I was looking for. I ended up buying the coffee table and entertainment center as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer  H.

customer_reviews.title: Nice modern little table
customer_reviews.text: Heavy, durable, and looks modern. Great price for the quality. The finish is laminated, but doesn't look cheap. I'm happy with this little table.
customer_reviews.author: Screenial

customer_reviews.title: High quality particle board, very nice finish - just a bit expensive.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! Particle board is high quality and heavy for it's size. I would definitely buy again, but the price is the only thing keeping me from doing it now.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy. Put it with a desk and put my Printer on it. Like the style.
customer_reviews.author: karen3678

customer_reviews.title: Really pretty and solid table
customer_reviews.text: Really pretty and solid table. The top is heavy and good quality. The grain look is attractive and it was very easy to put together. They even included the allen wrench.
customer_reviews.author: drummermom

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you measure the height as they are better for low height beds
customer_reviews.text: Price matches the quality. Make sure you measure the height as they are better for low height beds.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Very sturdy. Looks more expensive than it is
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this line
customer_reviews.text: I love this line. I bought the desk, coffee table for my office and the side table for next to my bed. They are so sleek and modern and a really great deal for the price. They are also sturdy and easy to assemble. You do need to use a coaster though.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth McCormick

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice end table
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice end table. It's sort of art deco in style. It took minutes to install. It's rather cheap but will work well for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I like the table. Good quality and easy to assemble. Need to probably buy a second one.
customer_reviews.author: D.

customer_reviews.title: Up close you can tell the top is faux wood easily but nonetheless
customer_reviews.text: Cute for the price. Up close you can tell the top is faux wood easily but nonetheless, cute for a kids room.
customer_reviews.author: c

customer_reviews.title: Trendy & afforadable
customer_reviews.text: So happy with these tables (I bought two). I love the hair pin legs. The tabletop cleans easily but also scratches easily. Be careful what you place and slide in top.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Cobb

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together, and looks very modern and simplistic, but any liquid on the surface will cause it to bulge. Watch out for that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, sturdy and the perfect accent for the kids rec room. Modern in design yet solid, I'm hopeful that it will withstand the rigors that kids will place on it!
customer_reviews.author: ShelleyV.

customer_reviews.title: Super happy w/ this purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful end table for such a low price! Super easy to put together! I will be coating in a protective gloss as suggested by other reviewers.
customer_reviews.author: Road to Awe

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, well made, great look! I was expecting the top to look a bit like cheaper laminate at this price, but to my delighted surprise, it looks very nice like an actual plank of wood.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: The top is not waterproof at all. my husband ...
customer_reviews.text: The top is not waterproof at all. my husband sat a drink down for 3 hours later the top was peeling off.
customer_reviews.author: jaclyn kolovich

customer_reviews.title: Not the right color
customer_reviews.text: The product is a brown color and not the gray color that shows in the picture
customer_reviews.author: Debra S. Weimert

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This item looks better in person than online. Very light, very easy to assemble, looks very chic.
customer_reviews.author: Wu-Hoo!

customer_reviews.title: Love these tables
customer_reviews.text: Love these tables!!!!! They are beyond beautiful for such a great price. I get compliments all the time. The wood is a brown/grey weathered, exactly what I was looking for. Came earlier than expected and took less than five minutes to put together! Perfect size, perfect height, perfect everything!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy, easy assemble. No complaints
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Looks great. No scratches despite faux reclaimed/scratched wood depiction on table top.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Cute table.
customer_reviews.text: Instructions clearly written. Putting together is pretty easy. Sturdy when built. Nice for what I wanted it for. The color of the top seems a little darker than I thought from picture. But I like it just the same.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality table
customer_reviews.text: Great small table. Nice quality for the price. I use it to put my turntable on it.
customer_reviews.author: Lucien Desar

customer_reviews.title: Don't miss out!
customer_reviews.text: We bought the desk as well. We LOVE these products. Super modern yet classy. It was the perfect touch for our new home! Doesn't look cheap, which was my fear!
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Really nice. Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Really nice. Easy to put together, tool included. Took me about 10 minutes. Sturdy and nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to assemble. And I am horrible at assembling furniture! Did not need extra tools, just the allen wrench provided. The top is a bit darker than I thought it would be, and the material doesn't look as nice as real wood, but I still give it 5 stars because of the ease of assembly and it's a decent product at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple, Modern, Easy to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to assemble and appears to be well-made for the price. I was a little wary of the oak pattern of the table (afraid that it was tacky), but it's simple and modern and fits great with our gray and purple decorating scheme. Hopefully the product continues to be available because we might buy another when we have more space!
customer_reviews.author: nawoznick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These were beautiful, sent them back because they were too short but they were very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Keny Cas

customer_reviews.title: 60's retro
customer_reviews.text: Matches perfect to the coffee table and entertainment center I bought. It goes perfect with my 1960's retro theme.
customer_reviews.author: Hixson

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Looks kind of cheap though. Typical pressed wood and laminate. Feels flimsy. You get what you're paying for. Don't expect a lot. But prices right.
customer_reviews.author: M.A.

customer_reviews.title: Its NOT gray!
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting this to be gray. Its not! It's brown. Totally doesn't fit my living room colors. I'm disappointed but I will give it a chance to grow on me. Seems descent quality though.
customer_reviews.author: Shana Randell

customer_reviews.title: Works well in my bedroom
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together. Sturdy. Product is as described.
customer_reviews.author: S. Brodnex

customer_reviews.title: They are so easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: They are so easy to put together! They are taller than most end tables so they are even more perfect than I thought they would be for this room and the use as our coffee tables.
customer_reviews.author: carrie lee

customer_reviews.title: The quality is like what everyone says - the color and legs are ...
customer_reviews.text: The quality is like what everyone says - the color and legs are nice but looks a little cheap close-up. That's ok though. What bothers me is that the legs aren't even and it rocks back and forth.
customer_reviews.author: Hannarae Annie Nam

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: had these tables for some months now very satisfied.. the wood is fake on top but the legs are worth the price alone.
customer_reviews.author: TURNONE

customer_reviews.title: Good Retro Table
customer_reviews.text: Good, sturdy table. Solid on the legs and the wood is heavy. Good retro look.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly what I thought it would be. Vey simple to assemble . Lovely .
customer_reviews.author: Visitor

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be more satisfied with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be more satisfied with this purchase. The table is even more sturdy than I expected, and easy to assemble. It came promptly and packaged well. All round, excellent item.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa C.

customer_reviews.title: These are fantastic- super sleek and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic- super sleek and easy to assemble. The quality of the wood table top was more than I expected for the price. These are the perfect bed side tables! All others I was interested in were $80+ dollars, even from IKEA. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great table.I ordered one for my daughter also.Much nicer in person!
customer_reviews.author: Holly Mauser

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than buying a set of legs.
customer_reviews.text: Needed hairpin legs. Was able to salvage the legs and grommets from this for cheaper than buying a set elsewhere. perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Holliday

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: These tables are nice and fairly strong for the price.
customer_reviews.author: tager

customer_reviews.title: so 4 stars because the legs are VERY sturdy..
customer_reviews.text: table top is ugly...but i planned on using the legs on another project anyway..so 4 stars because the legs are VERY sturdy...look nice!
customer_reviews.author: bjs

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: They are a little less gray and with taupe undertones than true grey.
customer_reviews.author: Krista Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble and it a great piece for the living room.
customer_reviews.author: Mystique

customer_reviews.title: Love them! Exactly as described by other buyers except ...
customer_reviews.text: Love them! Exactly as described by other buyers except they were heavier and sturdier. I will be buying the coffee table. Today.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: The legs are sturdy and powder coated
customer_reviews.text: Nicer than expected for the price. The legs are sturdy and powder coated. The top is a fake wood laminate but looks nicer than it sounds.
customer_reviews.author: sheerstatic

customer_reviews.title: Very nice tables. Very happy with them for what they ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice tables. Very happy with them for what they are. Work perfect in my mid century home spare bedroom
customer_reviews.author: Brad S

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This end ltable is awesome! So esy to put together I really love it! Im using it as a bedside table and its really sharp!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: I was a little disappointed when looking at the veneer up close
customer_reviews.text: Took about 20ish minutes to assemble. I was a little disappointed when looking at the veneer up close, but you can't tell that it's not all real from more than a foot away. I love the hairpin leg look.
customer_reviews.author: Hanzabean

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with those
customer_reviews.text: I only bought it for the table legs. I'm happy with those! :) The table top is a laminate, but I was surprised at how heavy it was!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: I would have really liked the product if it wasn't for the misleading item ...
customer_reviews.text: The color on this item is very misleading. I was expecting a light grey color, and to my surprise when i opened the package it was a brown table. I would have really liked the product if it wasn't for the misleading item description.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect table for carpeted area
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting much for the price. However, the table very solid and put together quick! Perfect table for carpeted area. Stable and won't tip!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these for my living room. They are perfect
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but thus far I really like it. Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I've only had it put together for a week or so, but thus far I really like it. Sturdy, easy to put together and it looks great. Very happy so far!
customer_reviews.author: RandiW

customer_reviews.title: Love the style
customer_reviews.text: Added the side table after we received the console table! Love the style!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Foreman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty and the color is perfect!! Very mid century and not to big and not to small!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy. Looks great in my bedroom with the TV stand.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting so much for the money. One of the best buys I've made in Amazon. High quality for the money. Stable and beautiful. No doubt it will last for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I really love these! They're a great height, sturdy, easy to put together and have just the look I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Kreher

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, looks nice and seems very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice table easy assembly. Good quality. Will order more pieces to match.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great table! Where are the hairpins?!
customer_reviews.text: Is there anything this table won't hold?! Sadly, it didn't come with any hairpins.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Rose

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Affordable, looks great and easy to put together. My 13 year old daughter put it together, along with the coffee table in the same style. Love them
customer_reviews.author: BethJ

product_meta.title: Ameriwood Home Owen Retro End Table, Sonoma Oak/Gunmetal Gray
product_meta.description: Create a throwback look with the Ameriwood Home Owen Retro End Table. Crafted with a mid-century design, the gunmetal-gray hairpin-style legs offer an industrial feel. At the same time, the distressed oak finish of the tabletop is both charming and rustic
feature_bullets: Add style to your living room, dining room, kitchen or bedroom with the Ameriwood Home Owen End Table
Slim and compact, it fits perfectly in small rooms and can hold up to 20 lbs
Minimal assembly required. Dimensions: 21.85"h x 19.5"w x 19.5"d. Shipping weight is approximately 18.35 lbs
Gray hairpin-style legs accent the brown oak table surface
This table is made from laminated particleboard with powder-coated metal legs
